articles.author: Jack Barnett
articles.title: Post-Brexit rebound: London muscles out Amsterdam to reclaim trading top spot - City A.M.
articles.description: The City reclaimed its place at the top of Europe’s largest share trading centre rankings last month for the first time since Brexit.
articles.content:
The City reclaimed its place at the top of Europes largest share trading centre rankings last month for the first time since Brexit, muscling out Amsterdam from top spot.

articles.title: BREAKING | Double Covid Jab 'Protects' Against Delta Variant, Says European Medicines Agency - ABP Live
articles.description: Marco Cavaleri, the EMA head of vaccine strategy, said the “emerging data from real world evidence are showing that two doses of vaccines are protective against the Delta variant”.
